title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: Interaction-Discussion-Based Design for Nursing Professional Values Education

context.prior_knowledge: Core nursing theories and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and propose solutions for three or more ethical dilemma cases required in specialized nursing practice situations within eight weeks.
Learners can explain the process of prioritizing nursing values through interactions with peer learners during weekly discussion activities.
Learners can produce a nursing practice scenario portfolio reflecting their personal value system through a project-based assessment at the end of the course.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
